target_text: "During the software development process, we implement and exercise practices that assure quality."

Codebook.Definition: Actions and methodologies implemented during software development to ensure the quality of the final product.
The structured sequence of stages and activities involved in creating software, from initial conception to deployment.
The act of putting specific quality assurance methods into action within the software development workflow.
The active engagement and application of quality assurance techniques during the software development process.
